# Generic data workflow

<div class="mermaid">
graph TD;
    subgraph Dataflow;
    A((Input data)) ==>  B[Cleaning programs];
    B ==> C((Analysis data));
    C ==> D[Analysis programs]
    D ==> E((Outputs));
    end;
    B -.-> F(("Auxiliary data<br/>(created)"));
    F -.-> C;
    Z((Source)) -.-> X[Data citation] -.-> A;

</div>
